ack.p: We thank Isa Matos, Miguel Machado, Miguel Santos and Joana Pinho for their help in fieldwork. We thank two anonymous reviewers, Vitor Sousa and Margarida Matos for their helpful comments and suggestions on the manuscript. We also acknowledge ICNF (Instituto da Conservação da Natureza e Florestas) for issuing the fishing licenses. This work was supported by the FCT fellowship SFRH/BD/73801/2010 to Tiago F. Jesus.
